scripts.infra:dev:up: docker compose up --wait postgres redis letta -d
scripts.infra:dev:stop: docker compose stop postgres redis letta
scripts.infra:dev:start: docker compose start postgres redis letta
scripts.infra:dev:rm: docker compose down postgres redis letta -v
scripts.infra:dev:reset: npm run infra:dev:rm && npm run infra:dev:up && npm run prisma:dev:deploy
scripts.infra:test:up: dotenv -e .env.test -- docker compose -p remember-now-test -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml up --wait postgres redis letta -d
scripts.infra:test:stop: docker compose -p remember-now-test -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml stop postgres redis letta
scripts.infra:test:start: docker compose -p remember-now-test -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml start postgres redis letta
scripts.infra:test:rm: docker compose -p remember-now-test -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml down postgres redis letta -v
scripts.infra:test:reset: npm run infra:test:rm && npm run infra:test:up && npm run prisma:test:deploy
scripts.start:migrate:prod: prisma migrate deploy && npm run start:prod
scripts.test:e2e: npm run infra:test:reset && npm run test:e2e:base ; npm run infra:test:rm
scripts.test:e2e:watch: npm run infra:test:reset && npm run test:e2e:base -- --watch --no-cache ; npm run infra:test:rm
scripts.test:e2e:auth: npm run infra:test:reset && npm run test:e2e:base -- --testPathPattern=auth ; npm run infra:test:rm
scripts.test:e2e:user: npm run infra:test:reset && npm run test:e2e:base -- --testPathPattern=user ; npm run infra:test:rm
scripts.test:e2e:integration: npm run infra:test:reset && npm run test:e2e:base -- --testPathPattern=integration ; npm run infra:test:rm
scripts.test:e2e:verbose: npm run infra:test:reset && npm run test:e2e:base -- --verbose ; npm run infra:test:rm
scripts.test:e2e:cov: npm run infra:test:reset && npm run test:e2e:base -- --coverage ; npm run infra:test:rm
